titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Army to award the Air Medal to Thomas Dewey Wise for service as a member of the Army during the Vietnam War.
To authorize the Secretary of the Army to award the Air Medal to Thomas Dewey Wise for service as a member of the Army during the Vietnam War.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: This bill authorizes the Department of the Army to award the Air Medal to Thomas Dewey Wise for his service as a member of the Army during the Vietnam War.
